unnormalised: Spotted! Armaan Jain's wife, Anissa Malhotra, was seen grabbing coffee at a Bandra cafe with, wait for it…Kiara Advani's ex-boyfriend! Sources say they looked mighty cozy. Could this be the newest Bollywood connection we didn't see coming?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, whispers are swirling around Janhvi Kapoor and her alleged break-up with Shikhar Pahariya. Paparazzi photos show her looking forlorn outside Mount Mary Church. Is she praying for a reconciliation? Or maybe just reflecting on *that* Karan Johar rapid fire round!

unnormalised: And speaking of rapid fire, rumour has it that Ranveer Singh's next film will be a remake of the classic 'Andaaz Apna Apna'! But who will play Amar and Prem? Speculations are running wilder than a Delhi wedding baraat! Stay tuned for more updates, folks! This is juicier than a plate of golgappe at Connaught Place!
